# IP 10.0.100.100/8

	## NET ID
	10.0.0.0
	00001010.00000000.00000000.00000000
	
	## BROADCAST
	10.255.255.255
	00001010.11111111.11111111.11111111
	00000000.11111111.11111111.11111111
	
	## TAMANHO DO BLOCO
	2^32-8 = 2^24 = 16 777 216
	
	## QUANTIDADE DE HOSTS
	16 777 214

# IP 172.16.32.40/18

	## NET ID
	172.16.0.0
	11111111.11111111.11000000.00000000
	
	## BROADCAST
	172.16.192.255
	01010110.00001000.00111111.11111111
	00000000.00000000.00111111.11111111
	
	## TAMANHO DO BLOCO
	2^32-18 = 16 384 
	
	## QUANTIDADE DE HOSTS
	16 382
	
# IP 10.0.100.100/26
	00001010.00000000.01100100.01100100
	11111111.11111111.11111111.11000000

	## NET ID
	10.0.100.64
	00001010.00000000.01100100.01000000
	
	## BROADCAST
	10.0.100.127
	00001010.00000000.01100100.01111111
	00000000.00000000.00000000.00111111
	
	## TAMANHO DO BLOCO
	2^32-26 = 64
	
	## QUANTIDADE DE HOSTS
	62
	
# IP 192.168.1.200/30
	11000000.10101000.00000001.11001000

	## BROADCAST
	192.168.1.203
	11000000.10101000.00000001.11001011
	00000000.00000000.00000000.00000011
	
	## TAMANHO DO BLOCO

# IP 10.10.10.10/22
	00001010.00001010.00001010.00001010
	11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000

	## NET ID 
	10.10.8.0
	00001010.00001010.00001000.00000000
	
	## BROADCAST
	10.10.11.255
	00001010.00001010.00001011.11111111
	00000000.00000000.00000011.11111111
	
	## TAMANHO DO BLOCO
	2^32-22 = 1024
	
	## QUANTIDADE DE HOSTS
